body:
Well firstly, use of fragment is very nice choice and I also use fragments when I use NavigationDrawer in my Application to download data and show list or whatever kind of layout. You can use AsyncTask in fragment also to download data and display them.

Secondly, how could you know which menu is going to be selected by user to download data before creating the fragment. It's very OK showing loading screen or something like progress bar to download data and populate into fragment.
title: Android - Should I use Activities or Fragments for my navigation bar if I need to download data
